title: The 76ers Are Out
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss the Heat eliminating the 76ers, NBA and NHL series sent to Game 7s and Brian Windhorst joins the show.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: The 76ers are eliminated from the NBA Playoffs and multiple Game 7s
